https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rZfVJGY3W5Fu8SxVXhnZPzxKZe0.jpg 2016 marks the 500th anniversary of the death of Hieronymus Bosch. It is almost the only information about the artist of The Garden of Earthly Delights that we can put a precise date to. Bosch, the garden of dreams is a film about his most important painting and one of the most iconic paintings in the world: The Garden of Earthly Delights. Bosch: The Garden of Dreams
